meanings.definition: A small hole in a firearm through which the charge is ignited.
meanings.sent1: The soldier carefully loaded gunpowder into the touchholes of the cannon.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to clean the touchholes of the musket after each use.
meanings.sent3: The touchholes of the old rifle were so tiny, it was like trying to thread a needle.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like touchholes, sparking with determination and readiness.
meanings.sent5: The touchholes glowed red as the cannon fired, lighting up the battlefield.
